text.front:
REWRITING METHODS
FOR WORD PROBLEMS
NACHUM DERSHOWITZ
Department of Computer Science, University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign,
1304 West Spring eld Ave., Urbana, IL 61801{2987, U.S.A.
Abstract
This paper outlines various recent approaches to solving word problems.
Term orderings are used to de ne a terminating rewrite relation. When con u-
ent, that relation de nes unique normal forms that can be used to decide word
problems. Some results obtained by these methods are summarized.
This research was supported in part by the U. S. National Science Foundation under Grant
CCR-90-07195.
